welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jimenez, Costa Rica! Get ready to be enchanted by the vibrant culture, lush tropical landscapes, and friendly locals that make this city so special. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that Jimenez has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tortuguero Airport serves both domestic and international flights.
